US threatens action against Iran at IAEA over continued 'stonewalling'The United States on Thursday threatened future action against Iran at the U.N. nuclear watchdog if Tehran keeps "stonewalling" the watchdog by denying it the cooperation and answers it seeks on issues including long-unexplained uranium traces. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 12:54:15 GMT AVGMZ5LLKFPFTDFROZTIVJEEM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-threatens-action-against-iran-iaea-over-continued-stonewalling-2024-03-07/Francois Murphy世界
China interference in Lithuania polls 'can't be ruled out', says security chiefChinese interference in this year's elections in EU and NATO member Lithuania "definitely cannot be ruled out" due to Lithuanian support for Taiwan, the chief of Lithuania’s counter-intelligence said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:31:32 GMT B3OXQQWJ4NONJFJVOBQ2AEJAS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-interference-lihuania-polls-cant-be-ruled-out-says-security-chief-2024-03-07/Andrius Sytas世界
UN data: Global patent filings drop nearly 2% as innovation faltersPatent filings slipped last year by nearly 2% in the first fall in 14 years amid economic uncertainty, the U.N. patent agency said on Thursday, in a move it described as "concerning". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:29:10 GMT JG3NZUKOIZP3LI362NOADQZLNU https://www.reuters.com/world/un-data-global-patent-filings-drop-nearly-2-innovation-falters-2024-03-07/Reuters世界
Indian government panel backs higher carbon tax on coal importsA panel of officials from Indian ministries has called for a bigger carbon tax on higher quality imported coal while cutting rates for domestic coal, in a bid to slash shipments of the polluting fuel, the coal ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:17:29 GMT 5CVWMAPCINOMDOO4PSGLQHFGTI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-government-panel-backs-higher-carbon-tax-coal-imports-2024-03-07/Sudarshan Varadhan可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Morning Bid: Brighter mood as ECB meets, yen knocks NikkeiA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:08:48 GMT OGNMNSETYJOFRKYJNWNB3J4L7E https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-03-07/Reuters市场美国市场
New push in Congress to ban TikTok or force Chinese divestiture gains steamThe U.S. House Committee on Energy and Commerce on Thursday is expected to vote on legislation giving China's ByteDance six months to divest from short video app TikTok or face a U.S. ban. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:02:45 GMT 76D576RYEZNSVG2SPX4UAURVFY https://www.reuters.com/technology/new-push-congress-ban-tiktok-or-force-chinese-divestiture-gains-steam-2024-03-07/David Shepardson技术
